ComicInfo.Series: Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: The Laughing Corpse
ComicInfo.Summary:
The comic adaptation of the second book in Laurell K. Hamilton’s best-selling series continues here! Anita Blake has seen ghouls, zombies, vampires, and a host of other bloodthirsty monstrosities that could set a brave man to running, but when a murder scene leaves her with some disturbing questions, Anita realizes that something is going on that even she can’t explain. Enter Senora Dominga Salvador, the Godmother of Vaudun. Will she be able to help Anita discover just who or what is committing these murders? Or does she have her own plans for Anita?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/anita-blake-vampire-hunter-the-laughing-corpse-2-p/4000-141607/
